item.name: DiscreteGaussianImageFilter
item.description: Gaussian smothing filter. Filters the image with a gaussian kernel defined by variance.

parameter.description: Write output to disk
Write meta data to disk
Define the maximum number of concurrent threads. Setting it to -1 uses all available cores (default).
If set to 1, compression is used for file saving.
Switch between uint8 and uint16 result image types.
Variance of the gaussian kernel.
Maximum error of the gaussian function approximation.
Maximum kernel size in pixel.
Use the real spacing for the gaussian kernel creation.

item.name: IntensityWindowingImageFilter
item.description: Rescales the image min to max to the specified range

parameter.description: Write output to disk
Write meta data to disk
Define the maximum number of concurrent threads. Setting it to -1 uses all available cores (default).
If set to 1, compression is used for file saving.
Switch between uint8 and uint16 result image types.
The minimum value of the output image.
The maximum value of the output image.
The minimum value of the output image.
The maximum value of the output image.

item.name: MultiplyImageFilter
item.description: Pixel-wise multiplication of two images.

Switch between uint8 and uint16 result image types.
If non-zero, this is used instead of the second input image for multiplication.

parameter.description: Write output to disk

If > 0, the value serves as quantile threshold.

item.name: ImageReader
item.description: Reads image from disk

parameter.description: Write output to disk
Write meta data to disk
Define the maximum number of concurrent threads. Setting it to -1 uses all available cores (default).
If set to 1, compression is used for file saving.
Switch between uint8 and uint16 result image types.
Combine separate 2D images to one 3D stack. Drag&drop first file of the series and substitute the series index by %0nd, with n being the number of digits.
Start index for the series reader
End index for the series reader
Index increment for the series reader
Original spacing in the first dimension
Original spacing in the second dimension
Original spacing in the third dimension
Minimum intensity value of the input image. Set to -1 for auto detection
Maximum intensity value of the input image. Set to -1 for auto detection

item.name: SobelEdgeDetectionImageFilter
item.description: A 2D or 3D edge detection using the Sobel operator.

parameter.description: Write output to disk
Write meta data to disk
Define the maximum number of concurrent threads. Setting it to -1 uses all available cores (default).
If set to 1, compression is used for file saving.
Switch between uint8 and uint16 result image types.

item.name: MaximumImageFilter
item.description: Implements a pixel-wise operator Max(a,b) between two images.

parameter.description: Write output to disk
Write meta data to disk
Define the maximum number of concurrent threads. Setting it to -1 uses all available cores (default).
If set to 1, compression is used for file saving.
Switch between uint8 and uint16 result image types.

item.name: GradientVectorFlowTrackingImageFilter
item.description: Two or three channel filter that traces the gradient flow.

parameter.description: Write output to disk
Write meta data to disk
Define the maximum number of concurrent threads. Setting it to -1 uses all available cores (default).
If set to 1, compression is used for file saving.
Switch between uint8 and uint16 result image types.
The number of iterations (should be slightly larger than the radius of the biggest object).
If enabled, background pixels are ignored.
If enabled, full neighborhood is used, otherwise only 4 / 18 connectivity.
Radius of the structuring element to be used to fuse nearby sinks.

item.name: VolumeBasedRegionRejectionFilter
item.description: Extracts the region properties of the image

parameter.description: Write output to disk
Write meta data to disk
Define the maximum number of concurrent threads. Setting it to -1 uses all available cores (default).
If set to 1, compression is used for file saving.
Switch between uint8 and uint16 result image types.
If input is binary, a label image is generated before extracting the region properties.
Switch between geometry and statistics mode
Determines the connectivity model. Use FullyConnected = 1 for 8/26-neighborhood or to 0 for 4/6 neighborhood.
All regions with smaller volume are suppressed. E.g. helpful for noise suppression in the EDM-based seed detection.
All regions with larger volume are suppressed. E.g. helpful for background suppression.

item.name: BinaryThresholdImageFilter
item.description: Creates a binary image

parameter.description: Write output to disk
Write meta data to disk
Define the maximum number of concurrent threads. Setting it to -1 uses all available cores (default).
If set to 1, compression is used for file saving.
Switch between uint8 and uint16 result image types.
Defines the lower threshold
Defines the upper threshold
Defines the value outside of the thresholds
Defines the value within the thresholds

item.name: MorphologicalWatershedFilter
item.description: Morphological Watershed Filter. Performs watershed segmentation of the input image.

parameter.description: Write output to disk
Write meta data to disk
Define the maximum number of concurrent threads. Setting it to -1 uses all available cores (default).
If set to 1, compression is used for file saving.
Switch between uint8 and uint16 result image types.
Initial level of the watershed.
If enabled, watershed lines are highlighted by zero values.
Use a 3D watershed segmentation.
If enabled 8-neighborhood (2D) or 27-neighborhood (3D) is used.
If enabled some debug output is printed.
If positive, only the slices larger than this number are processed.
If positive, only the slices smaller than this number are processed.

item.name: MedianImageFilter
item.description: Median Filter. Filters the input with a median kernel.

parameter.description: Write output to disk
Write meta data to disk
Define the maximum number of concurrent threads. Setting it to -1 uses all available cores (default).
If set to 1, compression is used for file saving.
Switch between uint8 and uint16 result image types.
Radius of the filter kernel (manhattan distance).
Use a 3D kernel.
